data.message: I've sat and thought about this for a long time and even tried it for a few years but I truly believe you have a flaw in your product by forcing people to use instant messaging, it forces me to answer right away when my phone goes off and cuts my productivity down in a big way it would be a great idea if you went backwards to a time when you didn't have to have messenger for people like myself who don't want to be available 24-7 but want the convince of being able to get your messages without going to the web to get them thank you for your time
